reviews.review: Awesome game to play with or without friends if you are a horror fan, or somebody interested in the genre but hesitant to try more intense/single-player horror titles. Will likely stay my most-played steam game for some time.
This game is fun and a definite recommended by yours truly!

This game is an amazing coop experience! I highly recommend playing this game with a group of friends as when you play with random people they are mad stupid. But none the less this company is constantly making updates to this game to improve the quality of life and there really is no other game like this out there. And if its not a coop experience you're looking for playing as the killer is just as fun. The character progression is amazing and the randomly generated levels make for some unique experiences. 

The only complaint I'd probably have is there are some balancing issues where certain killer are really only viable with the right attachments, offerings, or perks. As well as typically the killer is just waiting to capitalize on a survivors mistake so the skill ceiling for killers is much higher then that of survivors.

Great Game 8.5/10

Um jogo MUITO injusto e MUITO divertido, é um 50/50, recomendo para os que buscam joga-lo que o foco seja apenas diversão e sem competitividade, pois o jogo peca muito em balanceamento, mas não deixa de tirar umas boas risadas com amigos (ou até sozinho!)

Great game, it won't be boring.

Best Multiplayer game ever.
So much strategy

This game is great content-wise and delivers a great/fun multiplayer experience for you and your friends, however progression in the game feels slow. If you don't want to spend a dime on the game's DLC then you'll have a rough time trying to get a character whether it's a survivor or killer. Glitches also come with every patch but the creators update every once in a while. Overall I feel like this game has some issues that are often overlooked but the developers have put a lot of heart and soul into this game.
es un juego muy entretenido y simple, para el comprendimiento de cualquiera y tiene lobys rapidas. lo unico negativo es que no se pueda hablar con microfono por el juego con otros supervivientes.
é bom mas tem certos personagens com garras e motocerras que são muito apelões

Devs STILL suk pp

Update: Devs still definitely suk pp

Update 2: Devs making slight improvements but still very much still goin hard on the pp suk game. I have been playing this game since day 1, and I feel like the devs have completely abandoned the survivors and made them props in the killers game. They are tuning the game to Survive with Friends and the Killer getting 3 or 4 kills.


Issues: 

Events: This game used to have amazing events, and they stopped doing quarterly events to focus on the Halloween/Anniversary event. What did that net us? 3 years of the same copy pasta. This year they are doing hte same copy pasta and we get skins. I cannot be more clear about this, I would rather have fun events that change how it's played slightly than skins. For the love of god, skins are NOT the end all be all of this game, but it feels like that's what behavior thinks. 

Perks: Survivor feels very stale, and their response is to rework survivor meta perks. I can only imagine they will continue their killer bootlicking habits and nerf the meta ones in a feeble attempt to make other perks viable. I REALLY HOPE I am wrong. 

Dev hours: I'm so confused where their dev hours are going, they seem to have no problem pumping out tons of skins, but why does almost every other aspect of the game feel completely abandoned. Are they spread too thin between all the things they've added like the Archives, battlepass, and other stuff? I can understand why you need to have microtransactions to profit. But what I can't understand is why quarterly events were abandoned to focus on Halloween/Anniversary and they are STILL copy pasta. 

Desync: I can't believe that this has been a problem for so long, but I don't understand why if both of my feet are on the ground after vaulting a window, why a killer still gets the hit on a survivor. It seems like you are heavily punishing survivors for using the windows that are intended to gain distance on a killer. 


I have a lot of fond memories of this game and for $20, you could seemingly easily get the value out of it. I just think that the devs are lost in the skin sauce. 

This game has lots of issues, and it's been so long so I thought so fondly of it, but with 1300 hours played, it's hard to say it isn't worth it. The community is extremely toxic, so be prepared for some headaches.

Dead By Daylight, while it does have minor-major glitches such as: Hitboxes, Server Lag, and other things like that. I believe excluding those things would make Dead by Daylight one of the best games on Steam, you're all entitled to you're own opinion, that is just how is I feel.

This is not a horror game. This game is a torture method in the form of an asymetrical multiplayer video game. 
I would advise against playing this game as anything other than a party game with friends. However, if you are a masochist, or your enjoy your resolve being molested anally with a blunt pencil, you can go ahead and attempt to have fun. 
The developers of the game are inexperienced and ignorant, and attempt (unsuccessfully) to maintain a ranking system in a game that is more unbalanced than a hippo playing see-saw with a feather. Be it the disgustingly laggy servers, the extreme bias to survivors, or the mountain of useless perks this game has to offer, there seems to be not a single area of the game that isn't currently, or has been bugged.
Certain perks in the game are called Hexes, and one of these (although nowhere to be found in the game files) seems to curse the very player. No matter how much this game infuriates you, a strange force will bring you back to it, as if the entity itself were slithering its tentacles around your ass cheeks, and dragging you back for more...

ТУПАЯ БЛЯТ ПАРАША В КОТОРОЙ ТЕБЯ ПРОБЬЕТ С 1 КМ ДИСБАЛАНСНЫЕ АДДОНЫ  КОТОРЫЕ НЕ КОНТРЯТСЯ НА КАРТЕ СУК ОКОЛО 11 ПАЛЛЕТ В КОТОРЫХ ТЕБЯ ПРОБЬЮТ ИЗ ЗА ДАУНСКИХ СЕРВЕРОВ КОТОРЫЕ НЕ МОГУТ ОБЕСПЕЧИТЬ КАЛЬКУЛЯТОР ЗАГРУЗИТЬ ВИДЕО С ЮТУБА В КАЧЕСТВЕ 1 ПИКСЕЛЬ  ИЛИ ЗАФЭЙКУЮТ ПРОБЕГАТЬ В 1 ПАЛЛЕТЕ ОТ НОРМ МАНА МОЖНО МАЛО ПО ВРЕМЕНИ ТУПЫЕ ТИММЕЙТЫ КОТОРЫЕ СТЕЛСЯТ ЛУТАЮТ СУНДУКИ И НИУЯ НЕ ДЕЛАЮТ ТАКЖЕ ОНИ БЕЗ ЧАСОВ ТУПЫЕ ШКАФЧИКИ КОТОРЫЕ МЕШАЮТ НЕКОТОРЫМ НЕМНОГО АБУЗНЫМ МЕСТАМ АУЕННАЯ ИГРА СОВЕТУЮ ВСЕМ ПРОИБАТ ВРЕМЯ СВОЕЙ ЖИЗНИ В ЭТОЙ ПАРАШЕ В 2К16 ГОДУ БЫЛО В 200 РАЗ АТМОСФЕРНЕЙ ПОМНЮ КАК СРАЛСЯ ИГРАТЬ ДАЖЕ ЗА МАНА ПРО СУРВА ВБЩЕ МОЛЧУ А СЕЙЧАС СРУТСЯ ТОЛЬКО СТЕЛСЕРЫ КОТОРЫЕ ЕСТЬ ДАЖЕ НА 1 РАНГЕ И 20-КИАУЕННО БЛЯТ ЕСТЬ СМЫСЛ ИГРАТЬ ТОКА ВЗЛАМЫВАЯ ЭТУ ПАРАШУ КАК И ДЕЛАЮ Я БАН ЗА ЭТО ТЕБЕ ДАДУТ МИНИМУМ ЧЕРЕЗ 200 ЛЕТ ЕСЛИ ТЫ НЕ ЛОХ ПО ЖИЗНИ В ЭТУ ХУНЮ НВОЗМОЖНО ИГРАТЬ НО Я ТЕРПИЛА МНЕ ПОУЙ ЧТО ИГРА ГВНО ЕБАНОЕ
its tense, fun and i bullied my friends on it so 10/10

This game is extremely frustrating at times, especially for the new player. At the start this game will make you want to uninstall and refund. Going up against killers with 500+ hours, stacked perks, and knows the maps better than they know their own house will not be a fun experience for the newbie. 

But please stick with it. Once you get a few hours under your belt, you'll see why this is arguably the best non-symmetrical multiplayer game on Steam right now. I could explain the rush you get at the end of matches, but you've really got to experience it for yourself.

So please new people, stick with this game, it'll be worth it.

Fun Horror game with elements of advance techniques. 

I'd only recommend this game to someone that is a horror fan and is willing to learn the meta as the game could turn out to be very frustrating for the average person.
